prompt.title: JavaScript Tutor Prompt: Provide an answer to an assignment
prompt.context: I have completed the exercises for [TOPIC] in JavaScript and want to check my work.
prompt.instructions: 1. Provide possible answers or example solutions for the exercises on [TOPIC]. 2. Explain each answer briefly so I understand why it works. 3. If there are multiple correct ways, show at least two different approaches. 4. All code must run in a browser (using the console or tags).
